doc:
Peter Whitford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Whitford 0 Peter Whitford (born 1939) is an Australian radio, theatre, television and film character actor known for numerous roles particularly as wealthy businessmen and members of the aristocracy. Peter Whitford was born in Adelaide. He graduated from NIDA in 1963. In his early career, he played Jack Parker in the long-running radio serial Blue Hills. Peter_Whitford ( born 1939 ) is an_Australian_radio , theatre_,_television_and_film_character_actor known for numerous_roles particularly as wealthy_businessmen and members of the_aristocracy .
